item.title: Lemon Pepper Chicken
item.description: Heat butter and oil in a large pot. Cook leek, capsicum, cauliflower and salt for about 4 minutes, until they have softened. Pat the chicken dry and add it to a large bowl with flour, pepper, lemon zest and garlic. Toss to coat chicken and set aside. Add bulgur wheat to the veggies. Stir and cook for 1 minute, until the bulgur wheat is coated in oil and butter.
